publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3385.3 Karen Whitefield: Early Years Framework—As an amendment to motion (S3M-3385) in the name of Fiona Hyslop, after "now" insert "; notes with concern that, according to the Scottish Government Pre-School and Childcare Statistics 2008, the number of qualified nursery teachers employed in Scotland has declined under the current administration despite the claim of the First Minister on 25 September 2008 at First Minister’s Question Time (Official Report c. 11215) that the numbers under his government are substantially increasing".
